Name: streetmerchant
Overview: This service is a automated stock checker primarily focused on CPUs, GPUs, and Console Gaming Systems that has an abundance of mechanisms to notify your user group when items are available to include a link to add to an online cart.

Web Interface Port.Name: Web Interface Port
Web Interface Port.Description: This is Web UI port you can access via a web browser.

PROXY_ADDRESS.Name: PROXY_ADDRESS
PROXY_ADDRESS.Description: The IP address or domain name of your proxy

PROXY_PORT.Name: PROXY_PORT
PROXY_PORT.Description: TCP Port number on which the proxy is listening for connections

EMAIL_TO.Name: EMAIL_TO
EMAIL_TO.Description: Destination Email. Defaults to username if not set. Can be comma separated

EMAIL_PASSWORD.Name: EMAIL_PASSWORD
EMAIL_PASSWORD.Description:
Email password. (See below for Gmail MFA users)

If you use Gmail and have multi-factor authentication (MFA), you will need to create an app password and use this instead of your Gmail password.

https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords

TWITTER_TWEET_TAGS.Name: TWITTER_TWEET_TAGS
TWITTER_TWEET_TAGS.Description: List of hashtags to append to the tweet message, e.g.: #nvidia #nvidiastock

TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID.Name: TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID
TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID.Description: Chat ID. Can be comma separated, e.g.: 123456789,987654321

IN_STOCK_WAIT_TIME.Name: IN_STOCK_WAIT_TIME
IN_STOCK_WAIT_TIME.Description: Time to wait between requests to the same link if it has that card in stock. In seconds

SCREENSHOT.Name: SCREENSHOT
SCREENSHOT.Description: Capture screenshot of page if the product is in stock.

PHONE_CARRIER.Name: PHONE_CARRIER
PHONE_CARRIER.Description:
Supported carriers for SMS. E.g.: att or att,verizon,google, email configuration required. If multiple phone numbers are listed, enter a carrier for each phone number.

https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/notification/#supported-carriers

PHONE_NUMBER.Name: PHONE_NUMBER
PHONE_NUMBER.Description: 10 digit phone number(s). E.g.: 1234567890 or 1234567890,0987654321,11112223333, email configuration required.

SHOW_ONLY_BRANDS.Name: SHOW_ONLY_BRANDS
SHOW_ONLY_BRANDS.Description:
Filter to show specified brands. Comma separated, e.g.: evga,zotac

https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/

SHOW_ONLY_SERIES.Name: SHOW_ONLY_SERIES
SHOW_ONLY_SERIES.Description:
Filter to show specified series. Comma separated, e.g.: 3080,ryzen5900

https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/

SHOW_ONLY_MODELS.Name: SHOW_ONLY_MODELS
SHOW_ONLY_MODELS.Description: Filter to show specified models	Both supported formats are comma separated

STORES.Name: STORES
STORES.Description:
Supported stores you want to be scraped. Default: amazon,bestbuy. Comma separated, can include PAGE_SLEEP_MIN and PAGE_SLEEP_MAX values. E.g.: amazon:10000:30000,bestbuy,newegg:50000:80000.

https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/#supported-stores

AUTO_ADD_TO_CART.Name: AUTO_ADD_TO_CART
AUTO_ADD_TO_CART.Description:
Future Feature. Not available yet.

Enable auto add to cart on support stores, default: true

BROWSER_TRUSTED.Name: BROWSER_TRUSTED
BROWSER_TRUSTED.Description: Skip Chromium Sandbox. Set to true for containerized environments,

HEADLESS.Name: HEADLESS
HEADLESS.Description: Puppeteer to run headless or not. Debugging related, default: true

INCOGNITO.Name: INCOGNITO
INCOGNITO.Description: Puppeteer to run incognito or not. Debugging related, default: false

LOW_BANDWIDTH.Name: LOW_BANDWIDTH
LOW_BANDWIDTH.Description: Blocks images/fonts to reduce traffic. Disables ad blocker, default: false

PAGE_BACKOFF_MIN.Name: PAGE_BACKOFF_MIN
PAGE_BACKOFF_MIN.Description: Minimum backoff time between retrying requests for the same store when a forbidden response is received (ms)

PAGE_BACKOFF_MAX.Name: PAGE_BACKOFF_MAX
PAGE_BACKOFF_MAX.Description: Maximum backoff time between retrying requests for the same store when a forbidden response is received. (ms)

PAGE_SLEEP_MIN.Name: PAGE_SLEEP_MIN
PAGE_SLEEP_MIN.Description: Minimum sleep time between queries of the same product page. In milliseconds,

PAGE_SLEEP_MAX.Name: PAGE_SLEEP_MAX
PAGE_SLEEP_MAX.Description: Maximum sleep time between queries of the same product page. In milliseconds,

PAGE_TIMEOUT.Name: PAGE_TIMEOUT
PAGE_TIMEOUT.Description: Navigation Timeout in milliseconds. 0 for infinite, default: 30000

WEB_PORT.Name: WEB_PORT
WEB_PORT.Description:
This must be synchronized with the Web Interface Port values.

This is the internal port the container should serve the web interface on.

COUNTRY.Name: COUNTRY
COUNTRY.Description:
Supported country you want to be scraped	Only used with nvidia-api, default: usa

https://jef.codes/streetmerchant/reference/filter/#supported-countries

SMTP_PORT.Name: SMTP_PORT
SMTP_PORT.Description: TCP Port number on which the smtp server is listening for connections.

SMTP_ADDRESS.Name: SMTP_ADDRESS
SMTP_ADDRESS.Description: IP Address or FQDN of SMTP server

Console Verbosity.Name: Console Verbosity
Console Verbosity.Description:
The console output verbosity.  

Note: This is not logged to the system logger.

BESTBUY_API_KEY.Name: BESTBUY_API_KEY
BESTBUY_API_KEY.Description: Set an optional API key for faster Bestbuy checking via JSON

Log Path.Name: Log Path
Log Path.Description: This is where log files will be written if an error occurs.
